short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save Emails, Images, Pages to Google Drive™ in 1 Click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WHAT IT DOES?
- Saves Emails to Google Drive™ in 1 click.
- Saves Images to Google Drive™ in 1 click.
- Saves Webpages to Drive in PDF or HTML format.
- Lets you choose the destination folder in Drive.
- Lets you capture the visible page or full page.
- Find a list of all our features on our website - https://savetogdrive.com/

WHO LOVES IT?
- People that frequently save their emails to Google Drive™.
- People that love to save images to Drive quickly.
- Anyone annoyed with the other Save to Google Drive™ extension that doesn't work :)

HOW IT WORKS?
- Step #1: Install the extension and pin it to the toolbar.
- Step #2: Right-click the extension to open Options page.
- Step #3: Choose the file format and destination folder.
- Step #4: Go to any tab/webpage and just click the extension.
- Step #5: That's it! Your file will be saved to Drive and you'll be notified.
- Step #6: Not a real step but please leave us a review! Pretty please?
- Look at in-depth steps on how to Save Emails, Images, Webpages to Google Drive™ on our website - https://savetogdrive.com/

WHAT PEOPLE LOVE ABOUT US?
- No "Image Capture" or "File too Large" error.
- Offers option to choose the destination folder.
- Doesn't cut out part of emails/images while saving.
- It never errors out, works on all webpages in 4+ formats.
- We are a small team of 3 people that developed this. Real people, not bots!
- We are always open to feedback and respond within 1 hour to all emails (sometimes quicker!).

IS IT FREE?
It is 100% free, no hidden fees!

IS IT SECURE?
We just ask for basic permissions needed to capture the current page/image and send to Google Drive™.

OUR ROADMAP (Coming soon!):
- Support for all browsers (Edge, Brave etc)
- Show a preview before saving.
- And more...

WANT TO TALK TO US?
- Email me: hugh@savetogdrive.com
- Contact Us through our Website: https://savetogdrive.com/ 

Google Drive is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
